verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Leaning, leaning, safe and secure from all alarm, Leaning, leaning, leaning on the everlasting arms.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way, Leaning on the everlasting arms, Oh, how bright the path grows from day to day, Leaning on the everlasting arms.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What have I to dread, What have I to fear, Leaning on the everlasting arms? I have blessed peace with my Lord so near, Leaning on the everlasting arms.{/lang-eng}
